Articles.Content: Welcome aboard, LightningPenPen (Finally. ) and lawrencetyle!

Hello LightningPenPen and welcome to the forums!

Also, welcome to lawrencetyle!

Glad to have both of you aboard.

Happy landings!
hello to all,its nice to discuss rocket science i only played the game on vacation in a friends house,once i get the money i will no doubt buy it on steam.

Hello maxenzo2, and welcome to the forums!

I'm sure you will find it as enjoyable and engaging as most of us do.

Happy landings!

Hello all! Recent new member, who loves space even more than the talking head in Portal 2... and knows just about as much about getting there successfully

Quick question: The forum FAQ says I should be moved out of the "Curious George" group (and given permission to change avatar/signature, and post without delay) automatically after my third post... but that did not happen. Is it something a moderator has to do (I assumed no, from the use of "automatically")? I certainly don't want to be all impatient and such... but I am, alas, impatient and such
It is done automatically, Eunomiac, but not always right away. I imagine it's been done by now, though.
Hello! Welcome, and enjoy your stay!

Yo.(im just acting swag. whuteva)

welcome to the forums and dont feed the kraken!

i give rep to the newbies so yeah.have some rep!

Developers, what have you done

The whole my Steam games collection is useless now as I can't stop playing KSP.

Hello Fogged, and welcome to the forums!

I know exactly how you feel.

Happy landings!
whoopity doo! Im on the forums now.

whoopity doo! Im on the forums now.

Hi! We'll try not to miss you in the future.

Hi I just recently found KSP and I've never seen anything like it... It is the most amazing game ever!!!

So hi I love Sci fi stuff and Space it is so cool:)

Praise be to SQUAD!!!!

Hello Count Alucard, and welcome to the forums!

I agree, KSP is the most amazing game ever. Good to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Hallo Kerbonauts. I am Karmano Vorxotauriat, and I have played Kerbal Space Program for aboot 4 months now. It is a Vevy good game.

Edited September 24, 2015 by Vorxotauriat

Hallo Kerbonauts. I am Karmano Vorxotauriat, and I have played Kerbal Space Program for aboot 4 months now. It is a Vevy good game.

Hello Vorkotauriat, and welcome!

I'm sorry I missed your post earlier, and hope you enjoy and enrich the forums!

Happy landings!

Welcome, Nathan!

No Mario in this game, but there is plenty to do!

Hello everyone!

I've been looking-downloading mods for a long time & I`ve finally decided to register.

The only thing I can say at this moment is: I need more mods installed a the same time!!

See you around!

Hello Sobas, and welcome! Good to have you aboard.

If you need more mods, you'll be happy to hear that the prospects look good for 64-bit versions of the game in the next update.

Happy landings!

Welcome Sobas! Have you tried Active Texture Management? It makes things take less memory. Or magic. I think it's magic.

Have fun!
Hi everyone! Damaster architect here. Veteran KSP addict, always looking for bigger spaceships to explore the Kerbol system!

Hello DaMaster_Architect, and welcome to the forums!

As a KSP addict myself, I have found the forums to be very friendly, helpful, and interesting.

Happy landings!
im a long time player, first time poster. hello everyone!
